mapper.sql: uuid, mdtrt_sn, mdtrt_id, psn_no, visit_no, appy_no, appy_org_code, appy_org_name, bilg_dr_codg, bilg_dr_name, exam_org_code, exam_org_name, appy_dept_code, exam_dept_code,exam_dept_name, exam_mtd, rpotc_no, exam_item_code, exam_item_name, inhosp_exam_item_code, inhosp_exam_item_name, rpt_date, rpot_doc, exam_charge, vali_flag, ref_val, exam_unt, exam_rslt_val, exam_rslt_dicm, exam_item_detl_code, exam_item_detl_name, exam_rslt_abn, sapl_date, spcm_no, spcm_name, is_uplod, create_time, update_time, hosp_code
mapper.select: select COLUMN_NAME,column_comment from INFORMATION_SCHEMA.Columns where table_name= 'insure_bacterial_report' and table_schema='his_v2';

select from insure_clinical_checkout
and vali_flag = '1'
and visit_no like concat('%', #{visitNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
and appy_no like concat('%', #{appyNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
mapper.insert: insert into insure_clinical_checkout (uuid, mdtrt_sn, mdtrt_id, psn_no, visit_no, appy_no,appy_org_code, appy_org_name, bilg_dr_codg, bilg_dr_name, exam_org_code, exam_org_name, appy_dept_code, exam_dept_code,exam_dept_name, exam_mtd, rpotc_no, exam_item_code, exam_item_name, inhosp_exam_item_code, inhosp_exam_item_name, rpt_date, rpot_doc, exam_charge, vali_flag, ref_val, exam_unt, exam_rslt_val, exam_rslt_dicm, exam_item_detl_code, exam_item_detl_name, exam_rslt_abn, sapl_date, spcm_no, spcm_name, is_uplod, create_time, update_time, hosp_code ) values (#{uuid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{mdtrtSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mdtrtId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{psnNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{visitNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{appyNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{appyOrgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{appyOrgName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bilgDrCodg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bilgDrName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{examOrgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{examOrgName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{appyDeptCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{examDeptCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{examDeptName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{examMtd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rpotcNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{examItemCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{examItemName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inhospExamItemCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inhospExamItemName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rptDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{rpotDoc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{examCharge,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{valiFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{refVal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{examUnt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{examRsltVal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{examRsltDicm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{examItemDetlCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{examItemDetlName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{examRsltAbn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{saplDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{spcmNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{spcmName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isUplod,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{hospCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update:
update insure_clinical_checkout
mdtrt_sn = #{mdtrtSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mdtrt_id = #{mdtrtId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
psn_no = #{psnNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
visit_no = #{visitNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
appy_no = #{appyNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
appy_org_code = #{appyOrgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
appy_org_name = #{appyOrgName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bilg_dr_codg = #{bilgDrCodg,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
bilg_dr_name = #{bilgDrName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
exam_org_code = #{examOrgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
exam_org_name = #{examOrgName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
appy_dept_code = #{appyDeptCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
exam_dept_code = #{examDeptCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
exam_dept_name = #{examDeptName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
exam_mtd = #{examMtd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
rpotc_no = #{rpotcNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
exam_item_code = #{examItemCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
exam_item_name = #{examItemName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
inhosp_exam_item_code = #{inhospExamItemCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
inhosp_exam_item_name = #{inhospExamItemName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
vali_flag = #{valiFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
exam_charge = #{examCharge,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
rpt_date = #{rptDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
rpot_doc = #{rpotDoc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ref_val = #{refVal,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
exam_unt = #{examUnt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
exam_rslt_val = #{examRsltVal,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
exam_rslt_dicm = #{examRsltDicm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
exam_item_detl_code = #{examItemDetlCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
exam_item_detl_name = #{examItemDetlName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
exam_rslt_abn = #{examRsltAbn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sapl_date = #{saplDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
spcm_no = #{spcmNo,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
spcm_name = #{spcmName,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
is_uplod = #{isUplod,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
hosp_code = #{hospCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where uuid = #{uuid}
